title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1beta1\PreprocessingConfig\Pad
name: Pad
description:
Pad filter configuration for the input video. The padded input video is scaled after padding with black to match the output resolution.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1beta1.PreprocessingConfig.Pad

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.description: The number of pixels to add to the right. The default is 0.
